title: Indesign justified paragraph corrections
content: I am trying to move words in my paragraph (such as of at the end of a sentence) to the next line, but when i do a hard return or even keep hitting the space bar, my paragraph is no longer justified, instead it makes a huge indent. Does anyone know how to fix this? It is driving me crazy
author: schereme
